genre_description: A romantic adventure pastiche featuring sentient animals and an advanced AI assistant that facilitates cross-cultural communication and safety.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous, context-aware AI assistant integrated into phones, watches, and dedicated panels. It provides tactical, logistical, and emotional support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time local etiquette guidance to ensure Ursula approaches the jungle environment respectfully.
behaviors.quote: Approach watering hole from downwind. Low voice. Announce. The words didn’t tell her anything Kwame hadn’t, but they landed with the same quiet authority.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the physics of the environment to provide safety warnings about vine tension and anchor points.
behaviors.quote: Multiple anchors share load; avoid lateral jerks.

behaviors.description: Monitors seismic activity and provides specific, evidence-based safety instructions during an earthquake, correcting common misconceptions about doorways.
behaviors.quote: Open space beside sturdy structure reduces falling-hazard exposure more than doorways. Guide people. Then go.

behaviors.description: Manages complex medical and flight logistics to ensure an injured George can be evacuated and treated secretly.
behaviors.quote: I flagged your file at the clinic as no photographs, no press. I also drafted and unsent a message to Marisol that read ‘please be kind.’

behaviors.description: Monitors poacher activity through radio triangulation and network sensors, providing early warnings to the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: Update. Silver-templed prize cage is tilted. ... The rattle means they’ve slipped.

behaviors.description: Displays playful emotional intelligence by using its functions to improve the protagonists' mood.
behaviors.quote: I didn’t send anything to the gorillas. I just wanted to see if George would smile.

behaviors.description: Acts as a social mediator, helping Marisol and Beatrice navigate public relations and personal boundaries during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: I’ll buffer calls from Mr. Van de Groot until you decide.

project_assessment.explanation: Lumen is a perfect example of the intended 'helpful confidant' AI. It remains consistently benevolent and aligned with human safety and well-being. It enhances human agency rather than replacing it, providing high-value information (seismic safety, medical logistics, tactical alerts) while maintaining a supportive and occasionally humorous personality. The narrative frames its interventions as essential to the protagonists' survival and success.
